## CredentialWallet.filterByCredentialSubject() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Filters given credentials with given credential subject

**Signature:**

```typescript
filterByCredentialSubject(credentials: W3CCredential[], subject: DID): Promise<W3CCredential[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  credentials | [W3CCredential](./polygonid-js-sdk.w3ccredential.md)\[\] | credentials to filter |
|  subject | DID | credential subject id |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[W3CCredential](./polygonid-js-sdk.w3ccredential.md)\[\]&gt;

`Promise<W3CCredential[]>`
